# Claude CLI Advanced Starter Pack - Complete Overview

**Version 1.8.30** | **100+ Components** | **Production Ready**

**A platform-agnostic toolkit for supercharging Claude Code CLI with 30+ hooks, 5 agent patterns, 18 auto-generated agents, 5 skills, 7 MCP servers, refactoring system, project scaffolding, mobile UI, and GitHub integration.**

> **New in v1.8.30**:
> - **Happy.engineering Mobile UI**: Auto-detect Happy CLI, 40-char mobile formatting, card layouts, word-aware wrapping
> - **PR Merge Command**: `/pr-merge` with 9-phase workflow, safety checkpoints, rollback, blocker resolution
> - **Smart Update System**: Smart mode protects customizations, Full mode overwrites, auto-repair hooks
> - **Roadmap Orchestration**: Manual builder + GitHub integration, epic hierarchy, `/roadmap-*` commands
> - **Dev Mode & Backup**: `ccasp init --dev`, project backup system, configurable co-authors

---

## Command Reference Table

### Core Commands

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `ccasp` | Interactive menu (default) | `ccasp` |
| `ccasp init` | Deploy toolkit to project | `ccasp init --force` |
| `ccasp project-init` | Full setup wizard | `ccasp project-init` |
| `ccasp detect-stack` | Auto-detect tech stack | `ccasp detect-stack --json` |
| `ccasp claude-audit` | Audit CLAUDE.md quality | `ccasp claude-audit` |
| `ccasp claude-settings` | Configure permissions | `ccasp claude-settings` |

### GitHub Integration

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `ccasp setup` | Configure GitHub connection | `ccasp setup -o owner -r repo` |
| `ccasp create` | Create issue with analysis | `ccasp create -t "Bug fix"` |
| `ccasp list` | List recent issues | `ccasp list --mine` |
| `ccasp decompose` | Break down issue | `ccasp decompose 123` |
| `ccasp sync` | Sync with GitHub | `ccasp sync watch 123` |
| `ccasp roadmap` | Roadmap integration | `ccasp roadmap import` |

### Agent & Extension Creation

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `ccasp create-agent` | Create agents | `ccasp create-agent` |
| `ccasp create-hook` | Create enforcement hooks | `ccasp create-hook -e PreToolUse` |
| `ccasp create-command` | Create slash commands | `ccasp create-command -n deploy` |
| `ccasp create-skill` | Create RAG skills | `ccasp create-skill -n api-expert` |

### Testing & Development

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `ccasp test-setup` | Configure testing | `ccasp test-setup` |
| `ccasp test` | Run tests | `ccasp test --mode ralph` |
| `ccasp create-phase-dev` | Create phased plan | `ccasp create-phase-dev --scale M` |
| `ccasp explore-mcp` | Discover MCP servers | `ccasp explore-mcp --recommend` |

### Refactoring Commands (NEW)

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `/ralph` | Ralph Loop - test-fix cycles | `/ralph --max 10` |
| `/refactor-workflow` | Guided 8-step refactoring | `/refactor-workflow src/App.tsx` |
| `/refactor-analyze` | Complexity analysis | `/refactor-analyze src/` |
| `/golden-master` | Characterization tests | `/golden-master src/utils.ts` |
| `/refactor-check` | Pre-commit gate | `/refactor-check` |
| `/refactor-cleanup` | Auto-fix lint/format | `/refactor-cleanup` |

### Project Scaffolding (NEW)

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `/project-explorer` | Fresh project wizard | `/project-explorer` |

### Agent Management (NEW)

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `ccasp generate-agents` | Generate stack agents | `ccasp generate-agents` |

### PR & Git Commands (NEW v1.8.29+)

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `/pr-merge` | Interactive PR merge with safety | `/pr-merge 123` |
| `/update-smart` | Smart update manager | `/update-smart` |

### Roadmap Commands (NEW v1.8.27+)

| Command | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| `/roadmap-status` | View progress dashboard | `/roadmap-status` |
| `/roadmap-edit` | Edit roadmap structure | `/roadmap-edit` |
| `/roadmap-track` | Execute and track | `/roadmap-track` |

---

---

## Quick Start Guide

```bash
# 1. Install globally
npm install -g claude-cli-advanced-starter-pack

# 2. Navigate to your project
cd /path/to/your-project

# 3. Run the setup wizard
ccasp project-init

# 4. (Optional) Connect to GitHub
ccasp setup

# 5. Open Claude Code in your project
# Now you have access to all slash commands!
```

---
